verses.text: \w Now|strong="H4994"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* said \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w Elisha|strong="H3427"\w*, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w take|strong="H1121"\w* \w note|strong="H2009"\w* \w that|strong="H5030"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w meet|strong="H6440"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w too|strong="H4480"\w* \w small|strong="H6862"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w*.

\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w each|strong="H3947"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w can|strong="H6213"\w* \w get|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* log \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w can|strong="H6213"\w* \w build|strong="H6213"\w* ourselves \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w live|strong="H3427"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.” “\w Go|strong="H3212"\w*,” said \w Elisha|strong="H3427"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H5650"\w* one \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w them|strong="H4994"\w* said, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w come|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H3212"\w* \w your|strong="H4994"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*.” “\w I|strong="H5650"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* \w come|strong="H3212"\w*,” \w he|strong="H3212"\w* replied.

So Elisha \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H3212"\w* them, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* when they \w came|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3212"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, they began \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w cut|strong="H1504"\w* \w down|strong="H1504"\w* some \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*.

\w As|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H1931"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* cutting \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* tree, \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* \w axe|strong="H1270"\w* \w head|strong="H1270"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w into|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*. “Oh, \w my|strong="H1961"\w* master,” \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* \w out|strong="H6817"\w*, “\w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w borrowed|strong="H7592"\w*!”

“\w Where|strong="H8033"\w* \w did|strong="H1270"\w* \w it|strong="H7200"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*?” asked \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w man|strong="H5307"\w* \w of|strong="H6086"\w* God. \w And|strong="H6086"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w showed|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w man|strong="H5307"\w* \w of|strong="H6086"\w* God \w cut|strong="H7094"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w stick|strong="H6086"\w*, \w threw|strong="H7993"\w* \w it|strong="H7200"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w made|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* \w float|strong="H6687"\w*.

“\w Lift|strong="H7311"\w* \w it|strong="H3947"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w*,” \w he|strong="H3027"\w* said, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* man \w reached|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w it|strong="H3947"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Aram \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w war|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w After|strong="H1961"\w* consulting \w with|strong="H3898"\w* \w his|strong="H3478"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w he|strong="H3478"\w* said, “\w My|strong="H1961"\w* \w camp|strong="H8466"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w such|strong="H6423"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w such|strong="H6423"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H2088"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w God|strong="H7971"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* word \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: “\w Be|strong="H3478"\w* \w careful|strong="H8104"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w by|strong="H5674"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Arameans \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w going|strong="H5674"\w* \w down|strong="H7971"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* word \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* man \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* pointed \w out|strong="H7971"\w*. \w Time|strong="H8147"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w again|strong="H7971"\w* Elisha \w warned|strong="H2094"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w so|strong="H7971"\w* \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w on|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w guard|strong="H8104"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w such|strong="H3808"\w* \w places|strong="H4725"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w reason|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Aram \w became|strong="H1697"\w* \w enraged|strong="H5590"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w demand|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, “\w Tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w*, \w which|strong="H7945"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w us|strong="H5046"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w side|strong="H2088"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H5046"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w replied|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w No|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w*, \w my|strong="H5046"\w* lord \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* Elisha, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w tells|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* very \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w bedroom|strong="H2315"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* king said, “\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w where|strong="H2009"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w*, \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w may|strong="H1931"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w men|strong="H3947"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w capture|strong="H3947"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*.” \w On|strong="H7200"\w* \w receiving|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w report|strong="H5046"\w*, “Elisha \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w Dothan|strong="H1886"\w*,”

\w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* Aram \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H3515"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w*. \w They|strong="H8033"\w* \w went|strong="H5892"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w surrounded|strong="H5362"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w servant|strong="H5288"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* God \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w early|strong="H7925"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w morning|strong="H7925"\w*, \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w an|strong="H6213"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w had|strong="H2428"\w* \w surrounded|strong="H5437"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*. \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* asked Elisha, “Oh, \w my|strong="H6965"\w* master, \w what|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H5892"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*?”

“Do \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3372"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*,” Elisha answered, “\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H7227"\w* \w are|strong="H7227"\w* \w with|strong="H7227"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H7227"\w* \w more|strong="H7227"\w* \w than|strong="H3588"\w* \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H7227"\w* \w are|strong="H7227"\w* \w with|strong="H7227"\w* \w them|strong="H3588"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H2009"\w* Elisha \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w*, “\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w open|strong="H6491"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*.” \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w opened|strong="H6491"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w hills|strong="H2022"\w* \w were|strong="H5869"\w* \w full|strong="H4390"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* fire \w all|strong="H5439"\w* \w around|strong="H5439"\w* Elisha.

\w As|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* Arameans \w came|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w against|strong="H1697"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w*, Elisha \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w strike|strong="H5221"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H1471"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w blindness|strong="H5575"\w*.” \w So|strong="H2088"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w them|strong="H5221"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w blindness|strong="H5575"\w*, according \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Elisha.

\w And|strong="H3212"\w* Elisha told \w them|strong="H2088"\w*, “\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*. \w Follow|strong="H3212"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w take|strong="H3212"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w man|strong="H2088"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H5892"\w* \w seeking|strong="H1245"\w*.” \w And|strong="H3212"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w led|strong="H3212"\w* \w them|strong="H2088"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*.

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* entered \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, Elisha said, “\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w open|strong="H6491"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* these men \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*.” \w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w opened|strong="H6491"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* around \w and|strong="H3068"\w* discovered \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H5221"\w*, \w he|strong="H5221"\w* asked Elisha, “\w My|strong="H7200"\w* father, \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w kill|strong="H5221"\w* \w them|strong="H5221"\w*? \w Shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w kill|strong="H5221"\w* \w them|strong="H5221"\w*?”

“Do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w kill|strong="H5221"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*,” \w he|strong="H3808"\w* replied. “Would \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w kill|strong="H5221"\w* those \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w captured|strong="H7617"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* \w own|strong="H6440"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*? \w Set|strong="H7760"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*, \w that|strong="H4325"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H4325"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w then|strong="H7760"\w* return \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w their|strong="H7760"\w* master.”

\w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* king \w prepared|strong="H3739"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w feast|strong="H3740"\w* \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w after|strong="H1992"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* finished eating \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w drinking|strong="H8354"\w*, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* returned \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* master. \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* Aramean \w raiders|strong="H1416"\w* \w did|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H3212"\w* \w into|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* land \w of|strong="H1416"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w*.

\w Some|strong="H3605"\w* \w time|strong="H1961"\w* \w later|strong="H1961"\w*, \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Aram \w assembled|strong="H6908"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w entire|strong="H3605"\w* \w army|strong="H4264"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w marched|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w besiege|strong="H6696"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*.
